page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT IN THE RHU AREA.
page.content: As we live in a residential district, there is limited opportunity for employment within the immediate area, however, from our local survey we found that,despite this,there is a high level of employment amongst the residents.About 42% of the full_time working population have jobs either in or related to the Faslane Naval Base, 35% travel to the Glasgow area whilst 23% find work in the community.Most of these jobs are to be found within local authority establishments e.g. in St.Andrew's Residential School,Rhu Primary School,Blairvadach Children's Home and the Outdoor Centre.Other sources of employment are in providing services for the local residents e.g. in hotels,shops,small building firms and sailing clubs.Many of the private homes offer part_time domestic and gardening jobs for local residents.
